Finally landed in Barcelona and was famished!  My sister and I headed to this popular spot that was highly recommended by someone who lived in the area.  To our great surprise, this restaurant was one of the most memorable restaurant experiences we had in Barcelona.  The array of food selection and creativity in their dishes will keep you wanting to come for more.  To top off the experience, the retaurant's hospitality is above par in Barcelona.  You'll feel so warm and welcomed at this place that it will fool you to believe that this is how it's always is in Barcelona restaurants and service industry.  However, you'll soon find out that not all Barcelona restaurants tend to their customers like Teleferic.  Come vist and find out for yourself.
